repo_notes.project_name: LawBuddy AI - Legal Document Analysis Platform
repo_notes.description: A modern, AI-powered legal document analysis platform built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. The application leverages RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) with Google Vertex AI to analyze legal documents, identify risks, extract key clauses, and provide actionable insights through an interactive chat interface.

architecture.pattern: Component-based architecture with Context API for state management

key_directories.src/api: API client modules for backend communication (auth, documents, RAG queries)
key_directories.src/components: Reusable UI components and complex feature components
key_directories.src/contexts: React Context providers for global state (Auth, Translation)
key_directories.src/hooks: Custom React hooks for business logic
key_directories.src/services: Business logic and third-party service integrations

key_features: AI-powered legal document analysis using RAG + Vertex AI
Real-time interactive chat with document context
Document upload (electronic and scanned with OCR)
Document preview with zoom and download
User profile management with custom avatars and cover photos
development_priorities: Code quality and TypeScript type safety

coding_standards.naming: PascalCase for components, camelCase for variables/functions
coding_standards.file_structure: One component per file with clear naming
coding_standards.styling: Tailwind utility classes with custom components
coding_standards.state_management: Context API for global state, local state for component-specific
coding_standards.error_handling: Try-catch blocks with user-friendly error messages
coding_standards.comments: JSDoc for complex functions, inline comments for clarity

api_integration.authentication: JWT token stored in localStorage, sent via Authorization header
